00306 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_BaseSpectrum {
00307 
00308 public:
00309 
00315     EGS_BaseSpectrum() : count(0), sum_E(0), sum_E2(0),
00316         type("Unknown spectrum") {};
00317 
00319     virtual ~EGS_BaseSpectrum() {};
00320 
00327     const string &getType() const { return type; };
00328 
00335     inline EGS_Float sampleEnergy(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00336         EGS_Float e = sample(rndm); count++;
00337         sum_E += e; sum_E2 += e*e; return e;
00338     };
00339 
00345     virtual EGS_Float maxEnergy() const = 0;
00346 
00352     virtual EGS_Float expectedAverage() const = 0;
00353 
00366     virtual bool storeState(ostream &data_out) const {
00367         if( !egsStoreI64(data_out,count) ) return false;
00368         data_out << " " << sum_E << " " << sum_E2 << endl;
00369         if( !data_out.good() || data_out.fail() ) return false;
00370         return true;
00371     };
00372 
00386     virtual bool setState(istream &data_in) {
00387         if( !egsGetI64(data_in,count) ) return false;
00388         data_in >> sum_E >> sum_E2;
00389         if( data_in.eof() || !data_in.good() || data_in.fail() ) return false;
00390         return true;
00391     };
00392 
00405     virtual bool addState(istream &data_in) {
00406         EGS_I64 count_save = count;
00407         double sum_E_save = sum_E, sum_E2_save = sum_E2;
00408         if( !setState(data_in) ) return false;
00409         count += count_save; sum_E += sum_E_save; sum_E2 += sum_E2_save;
00410         return true;
00411     };
00412 
00424     virtual void resetCounter() {
00425         count = 0; sum_E = 0; sum_E2 = 0;
00426     };
00427 
00441     static EGS_BaseSpectrum *createSpectrum(EGS_Input *inp);
00442 
00448     void getSampledAverage(EGS_Float &e, EGS_Float &de) const {
00449         if( count > 1 ) {
00450             e = sum_E/count; de = sum_E2/count;
00451             de -= e*e; if( de > 0 ) de = sqrt(de/(count-1));
00452         }
00453     };
00454 
00460     void reportAverageEnergy() const;
00461 
00462 protected:
00463 
00470     virtual EGS_Float sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) = 0;
00471 
00473     EGS_I64 count;
00474 
00476     double  sum_E;
00477 
00479     double  sum_E2;
00480 
00484     string  type;
00485 
00486 };
00487 
00506 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_BaseSimpleSource : public EGS_BaseSource {
00507 
00508 public:
00509 
00517     EGS_BaseSimpleSource(int Q, EGS_BaseSpectrum *Spec,
00518         const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00519         EGS_BaseSource(Name,f), q(Q), s(Spec), count(0) { };
00520 
00531     EGS_BaseSimpleSource(EGS_Input *input, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00532 
00537     ~EGS_BaseSimpleSource() { if(s) delete s; };
00538 
00549     virtual bool isValid() const { return (s != 0); };
00550 
00562     virtual EGS_I64 getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00563             int &Q, int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt,
00564             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00565         Q = q; E = s->sampleEnergy(rndm);
00566         getPositionDirection(rndm,x,u,wt); setLatch(latch);
00567         return ++count;
00568     };
00569 
00578     virtual void getPositionDirection(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00579                    EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) = 0;
00580 
00586     virtual EGS_Float getEmax() const { return s->maxEnergy(); };
00587 
00598     virtual bool storeFluenceState(ostream &data_out) const { return true; };
00599 
00605     virtual bool storeState(ostream &data_out) const {
00606         if( !egsStoreI64(data_out,count) ) return false;
00607         if( !s->storeState(data_out) ) return false;
00608         if( !storeFluenceState(data_out) ) return false;
00609         return true;
00610     };
00611 
00618     virtual bool addState(istream &data) {
00619         EGS_I64 count_save = count;
00620         if( !egsGetI64(data,count) ) return false;
00621         if( !s->addState(data) ) return false;
00622         if( !addFluenceData(data) ) return false;
00623         count += count_save; return true;
00624     };
00625 
00632     virtual void resetCounter() {
00633         count = 0; s->resetCounter(); resetFluenceCounter();
00634     };
00635 
00645     virtual bool addFluenceData(istream &data) { return true; }
00646 
00657     virtual void resetFluenceCounter() { };
00658 
00669     virtual bool setFluenceState(istream &data) { return true; };
00670 
00677     virtual bool setState(istream &data) {
00678         if( !egsGetI64(data,count) ) return false;
00679         if( !s->setState(data) ) return false;
00680         if( !setFluenceState(data) ) return false;
00681         return true;
00682     };
00683 
00684 protected:
00685 
00692     virtual void setLatch(int &latch) { latch = 0; };
00693 
00695     int              q;
00696 
00698     EGS_BaseSpectrum *s;
00699 
00701     string           type;
00702 
00704     EGS_I64          count;
00705 
00706 };
00707 
00717 template <class T>
00718 EGS_BaseSource *createSourceTemplate(EGS_Input *input,
00719         EGS_ObjectFactory *f, const char *name) {
00720     EGS_BaseSource::addKnownTypeId(typeid(T).name());
00721     if( !input ) {
00722         egsWarning("createSource(%s): null input?\n",name); return 0;
00723     }
00724     T *res = new T(input,f);
00725     if( !res->isValid() )  {
00726         egsWarning("createSource(%s): the input is not "
00727             "sufficient to create a valid source\n",name);
00728         delete res; return 0;
00729     }
00730     return res;
00731 };
00732 
00733 #endif
